00025 #ifndef _Codec_H__
00026 #define _Codec_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00029 #include "OgreSharedPtr.h"
00030 #include "OgreDataStream.h"
00031 #include "OgreIteratorWrappers.h"
00032 #include "OgreStringVector.h"
00033 
00034 namespace Ogre {
00035 
00045     class _OgreExport Codec
00046     {
00047     protected:
00048         typedef std::map< String, Codec* > CodecList; 
00051         static CodecList ms_mapCodecs;
00052 
00053     public:
00054         class _OgrePrivate CodecData 
00055         {
00056         public:
00057             virtual ~CodecData() {};
00058 
00061             virtual String dataType() const { return "CodecData"; };
00062         };
00063         typedef SharedPtr<CodecData> CodecDataPtr;
00064 
00065         typedef ConstMapIterator<CodecList> CodecIterator;
00066 
00067     public:
00068         virtual ~Codec();
00069         
00072         static void registerCodec( Codec *pCodec )
00073         {
00074             ms_mapCodecs[pCodec->getType()] = pCodec;
00075         }
00076 
00079         static void unRegisterCodec( Codec *pCodec )
00080         {
00081             ms_mapCodecs.erase(pCodec->getType());
00082         }
00083 
00085         static CodecIterator getCodecIterator(void)
00086         {
00087             return CodecIterator(ms_mapCodecs.begin(), ms_mapCodecs.end());
00088         }
00089 
00091         static StringVector getExtensions(void);
00092 
00094         static Codec* getCodec(const String& extension);
00095 
00099         virtual DataStreamPtr code(MemoryDataStreamPtr& input, CodecDataPtr& pData) const = 0;
00107         virtual void codeToFile(MemoryDataStreamPtr& input, const String& outFileName, CodecDataPtr& pData) const = 0;
00108 
00110         typedef std::pair<MemoryDataStreamPtr, CodecDataPtr> DecodeResult;
00116         virtual DecodeResult decode(DataStreamPtr& input) const = 0;
00117 
00120         virtual String getType() const = 0;
00121 
00124         virtual String getDataType() const = 0;
00125     };
00126 
00127 } // namespace
00128 
00129 #endif
